name: Storm Chaser (Arya Vatan-Abadi)
description:
Storm Chaser

Storm Chaser is my first game jam game, made for the 2021 community jam. The theme of the jam was "Uncontrollable Fate" so I decided to make a game about chasing after a tornado since weather is an uncontrollable fate. Storm Chaser is also my first 2D game and I really enjoyed the challenges and workflow of 2D. The game was designed and developed solely by me in 4 days and you find a list of assets I used below.

Controls
  • Jump/Double Jump - Space
  • Fall Faster - S or Down Arrow
